details.old_value:
It looks like the windows installer allows to overwrite previous installation a bit too easily, which leads to "user issues":https://dev.etlegacy.com/boards/2/topics/3541?r=3549#message-3549.
We don't track where the game is installed in the win registry, but we should at least ensure the directory selected doesn't exist anymore.

subject: Prevent windows installer to overwrite old installation
description:
It looks like the windows installer allows to overwrite previous installation a bit too easily, which leads to "user issues":https://dev.etlegacy.com/boards/2/topics/3541?r=3549#message-3549.
We don't track where the game is installed in the win registry, but we should at least ensure the selected directory doesn't exist or is empty.
